407
May 20th 4
Sidney M. Goshorn Esq
Morning View
Kenton County Ky.
Sir

Your letter of the 17th inst to his Excellency Govr Bramlette, has been referred to me for reply. You are hereby authorized to recruit a company for the 6 months service, and as soon as you have a sufficient number of recruits you will report to Maj S F. Swope at Falmouth Ky by letter, who will give you full instructions and transportation for your men to Falmouth where provisions have been made to cloth and subsist them previous to regimental or company organization.
P. S. Each. recruiting officer will be commissioned to rank according to the number of men he raises --

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Genl Ky.
